I have started reading the book “Artful Design” by Ge Wang, and I’ll be putting here some of the final design challenges he poses in the end of each chapter. The cover to this post is a (very bad) photo of myself making a manual sign representing the word “jan” (person) in toki pona, which is a constructed (or should I say designed?) language by Sonja Lang.

Mouse-based music.
